content: An affine algebraic group over a field k is a representable covariant functor from the category of commutative algebras over k to the category of groups such that the representing algebra is finitely generated.
translations: ita:Un gruppo algebrico affine su un campo k Ã¨ un funtore covariante rappresentabile dalla categoria di algebre commutative
